name: Bitlands [Demo]
description:
In the Bitlands, you platform across strange, magical terrain while meeting even stranger allies and enemies. As you play, you unlock new allies that grant you special powers that will be vital in order to traverse the dangerous land and defeat powerful enemies! 

This version of Bitlands exists for testing purposes, and is incomplete. Here, you may find bugs, as the builds are not 100% stable. Mac builds along with other builds will come in later versions.

Controls:

Space: Jump

WASD: Movement

W & D: Ladders/Vines

E: (Once Energy Companion Unlocked) Launch Energy Blast

For developer keys and early access versions, become a beta tester on my discord! Also make sure to report any bugs to me:

Discord: https://discord.gg/4ny8w74

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/RipStudios?fan_landing=true

Changelog: (v1.0.1.16)

. First Level of Crystal Caverns Complete for testing

. Fixed Collision Bugs & Vine Swinging

. Game is now easier

. Dash is faster and reloads faster

. New levels

. Crystal Cavern final aesthetic

. Fixed Countless Bugs
